page.title: 19A Day in the Life of a Child
page.content: 0700:Wake up,yawn,stretch.Dream about coming day.Dad appears-pretend to be asleep-no good!-he tickles my feet. 0730:Up,wash,dress,clean teeth. Breakfast-cereal,toast,coffee. 0845:Set off for school,a place to work hard and meet friends. 0900:Drum bangs-line up-walk into school.Assembly-hymns,prayers,notices. 0915-1030:English 1030:Break.Can buy crisps,biscuits and stamps for the school bookshop. 1045-1200:Maths 1200:Lunchtime-eat sandwiches or have lunch cooked in the school kitchen. 1315:Afternoon school-topics, games,craft. 1530:Hometime 1600:Tea 1630:Homework,play out,talk,T.V. 2230:Bedtime-Goodnight..z-z-z
